item.title: By: Tom Strike

item.description: Preaching to the choir Jes :-)Just the names of the authors are enough to make me buy it; but your blog tells me where I'm going to start first in the book.
item.content:encoded: Preaching to the choir Jes :-)Just the names of the authors are enough to make me buy it; but your blog tells me where I’m going to start first in the book.
